description: This file is a shell script responsible for managing the PPPoE link for WAN connectivity, including bringing the link up or down based on system events and desired state. It interacts with system events, logs its actions, and controls the link accordingly.

methods.name: do_start_pppoe
methods.description: Starts the PPPoE connection by setting the current link state to up and logging the action.

methods.name: do_stop_pppoe
methods.description: Stops the PPPoE connection by setting the current link state to down and logging the action.
